Jonathan Foucher's blog & web development notebook

This is the about page of Jonathan Foucher, my blog and notebook about web development.

I mostly do php, but I love learning new. At the moment, I am simultaneously writing an iOs app, an Android app, a Java enterprise web application, moving my blog from Wordpress to Jekyll, and a few PHP webapps here and there.
